tool_description: Check whether a phone number is valid and get its metadata. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/validatephone.
name: Validate Phone by API-Ninjas
title: Validate Phone by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/validatephone
api_list.description: API Ninjas Validate Phone API endpoint. Returns metadata (including whether it is valid) for a given phone number.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: phone number to check. If country is not set, the 3-digit country code prefix needs to be included.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: 2-letter ISO-3166 country code the phone number belongs to.
